greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Value of n considered as a game.
formula: a(n) = smallest number not equal to a(i) for some i representing a 1-bit in the binary expansion of n (least significant bit is 0th bit)
results.author: Joseph Shipman (shipman(AT)savera.com)
